languages.text: Канцлер Даргонуса и внучка Абеляра, Клеменциа Версериан безупречно исполняла обязанности, также находя время на воспитание младших поколений семьи. Она была равно хороша в наставничестве, работе и интригах. Тем удивительнее, что, спустя век безупречной службы, она покинула свой пост и стала старшим помощником на торговом судне. Позже она признавалась, что страсть к кораблям и покорению пустоты жила в ее сердце всю жизнь — такова была порода Версерианов.

Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.
languages.original_text: Канцлер Даргонуса и внучка Абеляра, Клеменциа Версериан безупречно исполняла обязанности, также находя время на воспитание младших поколений семьи. Она была равно хороша в наставничестве, работе и интригах. Тем удивительнее, что, спустя век безупречной службы, она покинула свой пост и стала старшим помощником на торговом судне. Позже она признавалась, что страсть к кораблям и покорению пустоты жила в ее сердце всю жизнь — такова была порода Версерианов.

traits.locale_text: Dargonus's Chancellor and daughter of Abelard, Clementia Werserian, executed the office irreproachably, and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was equally good at mentoring, job and intrigue. All the more surprising was the fact that a century of immaculate service later she left her position and became a first mate on a trade ship. She later admitted that passion for ships and voidfaring lived in her heart for her entire life. This was the Werserian character.

Dargonus's Chancellor and daughter of Abelard, Clementia Werserian, executed the office irreproachably, and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was equally good at mentoring, job and intrigue. All the more surprising was the fact that a century of immaculate service later she left her position and became a first mate on a trade ship. She later admitted that passion for ships and voidfaring lived in her heart for her entire life. This was the Werserian character.

Clementia Werserian, daughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her office irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was equally good at mentoring, doing her job, and navigating intrigue. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

languages.text: 阿贝拉德的孙女，达戈努斯的宰相克莱门缇雅·韦尔森无可指摘地履行了她的职责，甚至还抽出时间教育家族的年轻一代。无论是指导后辈，还是提供建言，出谋划策，她都做得同样出色。经过一个世纪的完美服务之后，她离开了原本的职位，担任了商船的大副，这令所有人都感到惊讶。她后来才承认，她就像韦尔森家族真正的后人一样，始终热爱着舰船和航海。
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: 阿贝拉德之女，达戈努斯的宰相克莱门缇雅·韦尔森无可指摘地履行了她的职责，甚至还抽出时间教育家族的年轻一代。无论是指导后生，还是完成工作，出谋划策，她都做得同样出色。经过一个世纪的完美服务之后，她离开了原本的职位，担任了商船的大副，这令所有人都感到惊讶。她后来才承认，她就像韦尔森家族真正的后人一样，始终热爱着舰船和航海。

languages.text: Clementia Werserian, Enkelin von Abelard und Kanzlerin von Dargonus, übte ihr Amt ohne jeden Fehl und Tadel aus und fand sogar noch die Zeit, die jüngeren Generationen ihrer Familie zu unterrichten. Sie war als Mentorin, Kanzlerin und Politikerin gleichermaßen geschickt. Nach einem Jahrhundert des makellosen Diensts überraschte sie alle, indem sie ihr Amt niederlegte und Erste Offizierin auf einem Handelsschiff wurde. Sie gestand später, dass sie als echte Werserian schon immer eine Leidenschaft für Schiffe und die Raumfahrerei gehegt hatte.
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: Clementia Werserian, Tochter von Abelard und Kanzlerin von Dargonus, übte ihr Amt ohne jeden Fehl und Tadel aus und fand sogar noch die Zeit, die jüngeren Generationen ihrer Familie zu unterrichten. In ihrer Arbeit, ihrer Rolle als Mentorin oder beim Umgang mit Intrigen — sie war überall meisterhaft. Nach einem Jahrhundert des makellosen Diensts überraschte sie alle, indem sie ihr Amt niederlegte und Erste Offizierin auf einem Handelsschiff wurde. Sie gestand später, dass sie als echte Werserian schon immer eine Leidenschaft für Schiffe und die Raumfahrerei gehegt hatte.

languages.text: Clémentia Werserian, petite-fille d'Abélard et chancelière de Dargonus, remplit irréprochablement son devoir et trouva même le temps de transmettre son savoir aux plus jeunes représentants de sa famille. Ses talents de mentor, ses qualités de chancelière et son art de déjouer les complots ne furent jamais pris en défaut. Après un siècle de bons et loyaux services, elle surprit tout le monde en renonçant à sa charge pour devenir second officier à bord d'un navire marchand. Elle admit plus tard qu'elle cultivait, comme tous les Werserian dignes de ce nom, une passion pour les vaisseaux et les voyages stellaires.
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: Clémentia Werserian, fille d'Abélard et chancelière de Dargonus, remplit irréprochablement son office et trouva même le temps de transmettre son savoir aux plus jeunes représentants de sa famille. Ses talents d'enseignante, ses qualités professionnelles et son art de déjouer les complots ne furent jamais pris en défaut. Après un siècle de bons et loyaux services, elle surprit tout le monde en renonçant à sa charge pour devenir second officier à bord d'un navire marchand. Elle admit plus tard qu'elle cultivait, comme tous les Werserian dignes de ce nom, une passion pour les vaisseaux et les voyages stellaires.

languages.text: Clementia Werserian, nieta de Abelard y canciller de Dargonus, desempeñó sus funciones de manera impecable e incluso encontró tiempo para educar a las nuevas generaciones de su familia. Era igualmente hábil como mentora, como canciller y como la diplomática. Tras un siglo de servicio intachable, sorprendió a todo el mundo dejando su puesto para convertirse en contramaestre de una nave comercial. Más tarde admitiría que, como todos los auténticos Werserian, siempre había sentido pasión por las naves y los viajes por el vacío.
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: Clementia Werserian, hija de Abelard y canciller de Dargonus, desempeñó sus funciones de manera impecable e incluso encontró tiempo para educar a las nuevas generaciones de su familia. Era igualmente hábil en la enseñanza, en su trabajo y en las intrigas. Tras un siglo de servicio intachable, sorprendió a todo el mundo dejando su puesto para convertirse en contramaestre de una nave comercial. Más tarde admitiría que, como todos los auténticos Werserian, siempre había sentido pasión por las naves y los viajes por el vacío.

languages.text: アベラルドの孫娘にしてダルゴナスの議長であるクレメンティア・ウェルザリアンは、自らの職責を立派に遂行しつつ、あまつさえその隙を縫って一族の若者たちをも教育してみせた。彼女は指導者としても、法官としても、政治家としても有能だった。一世紀にわたって清廉潔白に要職を勤め上げたあと、彼女は職を辞して貿易船の一等航海士となり、万人を驚かせた。クレメンティアの述懐によれば、彼女は生粋のウェルザリアン一族のように、船とヴォイドの旅に情熱を抱き続けていたのだという。
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: アベラルドの孫娘にしてダルゴナスの議長であるクレメンティア・ウェルザリアンは、自らの職責を立派に遂行しつつ、あまつさえその隙を縫って一族の若者たちをも教育してみせた。彼女は指導者としても、法官としても、政治家としても有能だった。一世紀にわたって清廉潔白に要職を勤め上げたあと、彼女は職を辞して貿易船の一等航海士となり、万人を驚かせた。クレメンティアの述懐によれば、彼女は生粋のウェルザリアン一族のように、船とヴォイドの旅に情熱を抱き続けていたのだという。

languages.text: Abelard'ın torunu ve Dargonus'un şansölyesi olan Clementia Werserian; vazifelerini kusursuz bir şekilde yerine getirdi, hatta ailesinin gençlerine eğitim verecek zamanı bile buldu. Eşit derecede kabiliyetli bir yönder, şansölye ve politikacı idi. Yüz yıl boyunca pirüpak bir hizmetin ardından mevkisini bırakması ve bir ticaret gemisinde ikinci kaptan olması, herkesi şaşırttı. Daha sonra itiraf ettiği üzere, gerçek bir Werserian gibi daima gemilere ve uçsuz seyahatlerine merakı vardı.
languages.original_text: Clementia Werserian, granddaughter of Abelard and chancellor of Dargonus, executed her duties irreproachably and even found time to school the younger generations of her family. She was an equally skilled mentor, chancellor, and political operative. After a century of immaculate service, she surprised everyone by leaving her position and becoming the first mate on a trade ship. She would later admit, like a true Werserian, that she had always had a passion for ships and voidfaring.

traits.locale_text: Abelard'ın torunu ve Dargonus'un şansölyesi Clementia Werserian, vazifelerini kusursuz bir şekilde yerine getirdi ve hatta ailesindeki genç nesillere eğitim verecek zamanı bile buldu. Eşit derecede kabiliyetli bir yönder, şansölye ve politikacıydı. Yüz yıl boyunca pirüpak bir şekilde hizmet verdikten sonra mevkisini bırakması ve bir ticaret gemisinde ikinci kaptan olması herkesi şaşırttı. Daha sonra itiraf edeceği üzere, gerçek bir Werserian gibi her daim gemilere ve uçsuz seyahatlerine zaafı vardı.
